tool_description: An API that shows Climate Change News all around the globe
name: Changing Climate Live
title: Changing Climate Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns news of Climate Change from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://changing-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "changing-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://changing-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "changing-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news about Climate Change all around the globe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://changing-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "changing-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
